text.subject: Subject
text.hintPersonal: Note: Enter six digits, letters or symbols to form the personal question bank password, please keep the password for easy access to the question bank.
text.personalTitleListNull: Personal question bank is empty, please download template and import!
text.deleteHint: This operation will permanently delete the topic. Do you want to continue?
text.PleaseEnterName: Please enter the name of personal question bank first!
text.hint1: Answer mode: individual answer mode and two-person competition answer mode.
text.hint2: Topic Type: Covers all fields of knowledge in the world, including but not limited to science, history, culture, geography, etc.
text.hint3: Time prompt: After opening the time prompt, in the answer mode, after the game starts, there will be a time prompt every 30 seconds, when the time is up to stop doing the question, show the answer verification results.
text.hint4: Game details: In the game, students can not modify the submitted answers, after all the questions are selected, the answer verification results will be displayed. In the double answer mode, both students need to complete the answer before the answer verification results are shown.
